projects.title: Autonomous Arduino Cart
projects.summary: Scale autonomous vehicle controlled by Arduino with smart sensors.

modal.description: Project focused on developing a scale autonomous cart using Arduino and ultrasonic sensors for obstacle detection and real-time decision-making.

projects.title: Pressure Meter with Charts
projects.summary: Measurement system with real-time graphical visualization.

modal.description: Pressure measurement system that visualizes data in real time with dynamic charts. The project integrates electronic sensors and software for information analysis.

projects.title: People Detection Sensor
projects.summary: Smart sensor for automatic human presence detection.

modal.description: Intelligent systems project focused on automatic human presence detection using infrared sensors, applicable to security and access control.

projects.title: Voice-Controlled Drone
projects.summary: Smart drone programmed to obey voice commands.

modal.description: Smart drone programmed to execute actions through voice commands. The system uses speech recognition and control logic for basic flight maneuvers.
